thread.title: Ground News - Viewpoint: May the New Year restore hope in Ukraine and the Middle East
thread.title_full: Ground News - Viewpoint: May the New Year restore hope in Ukraine and the Middle East

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Viewpoint: May the New Year restore hope in Ukraine and the Middle East
text:
Summary by Ground News Arnie Fielkow: Since February 2022 in Ukraine and Oct. 7 in Gaza, lives have been uprooted. He says the atrocities committed by Palestinian terrorists against Israel on Oct.7 represent crimes against humanity not seen since Nazi Germany over 80 years ago. A truly just peace requires both Israel and Ukraine to remain strong militarily, he says. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Uptown Messenger Viewpoint: May the New Year restore hope in Ukraine and the Middle East By Arnie Fielkow, guest columnist As 2023 comes to an end, we all look forward to a New Year filled with much happiness, good health and fulfillment for ourselves and our family. Yet, while we in New Orleans have largely enjoyed a year of peace, the same cannot be said for the citizens of our […]
